title: ModuleAssemblerDataSchema_v1.0.0
description: Information utilized by ModuleAssembler when building a module.

Description.description: Description of the functionality provided by this module.

Version.description: Version number of this module, use Semantic Versioning.

License.description: The type of License being used for this module (ex: MIT).

copyResourcesToModuleRoot.description: Specifies if resource files will be placed in the built module's root directory, instead of in a resources subfolder.

CompanyName.description: Company or vendor of this module.

PowerShellVersion.description: Minimum version of the PowerShell engine required by this module.

GUID.description: ID used to uniquely identify this module.

Tags.description: Tags applied to this module. These help with module discovery in online galleries.

ProjectUri.description: A URL to the main website for this project.

IconUri.description: A URL to an icon representing this module.
